data.actual_result: It overlaps (well, underlaps) the 'Jump to Chat' button.
data.expected_result: It shows the message above the 'Jump to Chat' button.
data.short_description: Clicking on search results when there is only one message in the given channel causes overlapping between the 'Jump to Chat' button and the message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Search for a message - Click on the message to view the channel preview - Observe
